dialogue: Indeed it was. Now, onto our attack plans..
I will be leading our counter-attack, so if you have any questions or hear any new information, let me know..
We will be following a similar stragety to the one we used back in '98 to take over the Algul base..
Our attack plan is quite simple, our foot agents will circle the base, and use machines that emmit high frequency waves that should distrupt their electronics..
This should give us the opportunity to launch our own missiles and this just hopefully cause a lot of damage to their operations..
We are also aware that this would give the enemy a perfect opportunity to launch a surprise counter-attack on us, so stay on high alert!
*the attack seems to be going smoothly, and it's obvious that the enemy was not expecting it, however, you feel that things are almost going too well...*
I just feel like there could be an-
Oh great. Just when I thought we had the upper hand...
